settings.heading: In a Limited Space Every Inch Counts
settings.subtitle: Thanks to our ingenious designers, every inch of available space has been maximized through the use of multi-functional furniture and ingenious storage solutions.

settings.heading: Edge ONE Secure the Home and Perimeter

settings.text: Edge ONE is the all-in-one solution for home automation, security system, and energy management, now everything will be under your control with only ONE command touchpad!

settings.heading: Defender Mode
settings.text: Our security system includes external cameras that detect security events and promptly report them to you, as well as hazard detectors that guard against fire, smoke, floods, and break-ins

settings.heading: Privacy Matters
settings.text: Your choice to be offline to protect your privacy. All PODX GO pre-equipped smart devices and plugs are only connected to you. NOT us.
The A36 steel structure offers strength, durability, and pest resistance.
The polyurethane panel walls and roof provide high R-value insulation for  year-round comfort.
The auto-hydraulic system simplifies deployment and leveling at the touch  of a button.

settings.heading: Earthquake & Hurricane Resistant Structure
settings.text: The A36 steel structure provides strength, durability and resistance to mold, termites, and other pests.

settings.heading: Energy Efficiency and Noise Reduction Design
settings.text: The insulating polyurethane panel-built walls and roof have a high R-value to keep your home comfortable in all seasons.

settings.heading: One Button Control 15 Mins Setup On-site
settings.text: The auto-hydraulic system allows a simple push of a button to easy setup and takedown, and automatic leveling.

settings.heading: Whether you're a first-time homeowner, looking to travel and take your home with you, or just want to downsize and have an extra home in the backyard
PODX GO has different models to give you a variety of solutions to meet your budget and lifestyle
Thank You for Your Support on the Tiny Home's Big Dreams!

settings.text: The high cost of constructing a conventional home exerts financial strains on the buyer globally. Nontraditional housing options are becoming increasingly popular, especially among the young generations. And yet, brands available in the market today are often priced at a level and long waiting list that makes them inaccessible to many families that would benefit from them.

settings.process_text: Secure your reservation for the highly sought-after PODX GO model by simply indicating your preferred floorplan layout, selecting optional kits, choosing a flexible payment plan, and making a refundable $200 deposit.

Within just 3 business days, our dedicated customer service team will reach out to you, leveraging the reservation information you provided earlier. They will go the extra mile to confirm all the details and offer you the most cost-efficient plan tailored to your needs.

When you're ready to finalize your choices and move forward, we'll send you a build agreement. Once the down payment is made, we will reach the milestone to start crafting your tiny house from the ground up, and you'll see this gorgeous home within 90 days.

We have partnered with NOAH to guarantee the seamless implementation of building codes focused on safety, durability, and compliance. From framing to a range of tests, we will provide you with frequent updates on the progress of production on a weekly basis

Within just 90 days from the down payment, your remarkable tiny house will arrive at the designated pick-up spot in Ontario, California. At this point, you have the choice of personally collecting your dream home or opting for convenient doorstep delivery.

settings.text: We've teamed up with Acorn to provide financing solutions for those in need of assistance purchasing a PODX GO home. Now, owning your dream home is more accessible than ever before. Don't miss out on this opportunity – let us help you make your tiny home dreams a reality!
Having questions about start your tiny home journey?

settings.heading: No worries. We are here to help.
